articles.title: Art Performances Given on May Day
Statement of Spokesman for AINDF on May Day
articles.content:
Art Performances Given on May Day 
    Pyongyang, May 2 (KCNA) -- Performances were given by artistes of national art troupes in parks and recreation grounds of Pyongyang on May 1, a holiday of working people the world over.
 A performance was given by artistes of the Mansudae Art Troupe at the Recreation Ground on Moran Hill.    
 Put on the stage of the performance which began with chorus "May, Month of Victory" were such numbers as male vocal solo "Thunder on Jong Il Peak", "Blue Sky over My Country", "Indeed, It Is a Good World", female vocal solo "Song of Chollima Pioneer" and "General's Family Members" and female quartet "Nilliri of Happiness".
 The artistes of the Phibada Opera Troupe raised the curtain of their performance with chorus "Song of General Kim Jong Il" and "Song of May Day" at the Recreation Ground in Mangyongdae, warmly congratulating the workers significantly greeting May Day with the pride of creating innovations at factories and working sites.
 In front of the South Gate at the Recreation Ground in Mt. Taesong the artistes of the State National Art Troupe put on the stage colorful and peculiar numbers reflecting the revolutionary optimism and happy life of the workers in the Songun era.
 At the Recreation Ground in Rungra Islet the artistes of the National Comedy Troupe put on the stage comedic pieces showing the optimistic and joyful life of the Korean people living and struggling full of conviction of victory despite all ordeals and difficulties.    
 At the plaza of the Arch of Triumph the acrobats of the Pyongyang Circus performed physical acrobatics "Rolling Cylinders", "Rope Jumping", jugglery "Wonderful Box" and so on, delighting the working people on the holiday.

articles.title: National Symphony Orchestra Entertains Foreign Diplomats
Japan Urged Not to Turn Deaf Ear to Demand of Times
articles.content:
National Symphony Orchestra Entertains Foreign Diplomats 
    Pyongyang, May 2 (KCNA) -- A performance was given by the National Symphony Orchestra at the Moranbong Theatre on May Day.
 Invited to see the performance were diplomatic envoys and foreign embassy officials and foreign students studying in the DPRK.    
 The National Symphony Orchestra, a veteran art troupe representing the musical art of Juche Korea, put on stage the fourth movement "Glory to the General" of the symphonic suit "Long Journey for Songun Leadership", orchestra "Rich Harvest Comes to the Chongsan Plain" and "Swinging Girl" and other famous songs, leaving deep impressions on the audience.    
 It also successfully presented the ideological and thematic contents of foreign musical numbers such as the first movement of Shostakovich's 7th symphony "Leningrad."
 The audience was enchanted by the performance which took them by surprise with rich national flavor blended with the peculiar tone of a combined orchestra.
 A floral basket was presented to the artistes of the National Symphony Orchestra in congratulation of their successful performance in decorating the significant May Day stage with a rendition high in ideological and artistic plane.

articles.title: Joint Gathering of Working People on May Day
Probe into Truth behind Killing of Civilians to Be Made in S. Korea
Rodong Sinmun Calls on Korean Nation to Defend Peace
articles.content:
Probe into Truth behind Killing of Civilians to Be Made in S. Korea 
    Pyongyang, May 2 (KCNA) -- The Committee for Correcting Past History for Truth and Reconciliation in south Korea reportedly held a news conference on April 25 at which it decided to conduct a survey of massacres of civilians.
 At the news conference the committee said that more than 380 cases of massacres of different types and scopes have been raised.
 It clarified that it would probe the truth about those cases, asserting that more than 360 civilians were killed by the U.S. forces' bombing of the Kokgye Tunnel in Tanyang County, North Chungchong Province on Jan. 20, 1951, the biggest massacre committed in a day.    
 It will start probing the truth behind several cases of killings of civilians, including killings committed before the outbreak of the Korean war, massacre of those suspected of evading compulsory labor, and massacre of those related to the Association of Persons Protected for Public Peace, the committee held.

articles.title: Japan Urged to Behave Itself
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls on Korean Nation to Defend Peace 
    Pyongyang, May 2 (KCNA) -- The defender of peace, the very one who prevents war in the Korean Peninsula is the Korean nation itself, Rodong Sinmun today in a signed article says, calling upon the whole Korean nation to rise up in the struggle to defend peace against war.
 To defend peace against war is the most urgent task of the whole Korean nation at present, the article says, and goes on:    
 Anyone cannot defend peace in our stead and peace does not come of its own accord if it is wanted. Peace in the Korean Peninsula should be defended by our nation itself in any case. It is too clear that in case a war is ignited by the U.S. imperialists in this land, it would turn into a nuclear war sweeping over the north and the south. Accordingly, the north and the south cannot be different and overseas Koreans cannot be excepted in the struggle to defend peace against war in the Korean Peninsula.
 Any Korean who worries about the destiny of the nation should do his best irrespective of his residence to condemn and foil the U.S. moves for a war of aggression on Korea. When all the Koreans in the north and the south and overseas fulfill their responsibility and role as the master in the struggle to smash the U.S. warmongers' moves for a war of aggression, the peace of the Korean Peninsula and the security of the nation will be defended and the movement for national reunification will make a successful advance.
 The whole Korean nation should surely materialize national cooperation in the struggle for peace against war. All the fellow countrymen should save the nation from the obtaining grave situation and defend the peace of the country with the concerted efforts of the nation, transcending the difference of ideology, idea, political view and religious belief, class and strata, in the idea of "By our nation itself", the main spirit of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration.    
 Our Songun politics is the most creditable guarantee for defending the dignity and sovereignty of the nation, preventing war and keeping peace. All the fellow countrymen should have national pride and firm pluck here and make positively support and defend the great patriotic Songun politics benefiting any member of the Korean nation.

articles.title: Choe Thae Bok Meets Honorary President of Socialist International

articles.content:
Choe Thae Bok Meets Honorary President of Socialist International
    Pyongyang, May 2 (KCNA) -- Choe Thae Bok, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, met and had a conversation with Honorary President of Socialist International Guy Spitaels, former president of the Belgian Socialist Party (Wallon), and his party on May 2.

articles.title: New Remedy for Vitiligo Developed
Certificates of Honorary Citizens to Three Generals of Mt. Paektu
articles.content:
New Remedy for Vitiligo Developed
    Pyongyang, May 2 (KCNA) -- The Hospital attached to Pyongyang University of Medicine in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea has developed a new remedy for vitiligo.
 The new remedy is to take a stratum of basal cells from normal skin and transplant to the focus by the method of traditional Koryo medicine. The advantage is that the remedy leaves no scar and requires short time while treating a wide region at a time.
 The clinical trials show that it cures vitiligo in about 30 days with 98 percent of cure rate.    
 The remedy can be applied anywhere as its apparatus is simple to operate and it does not need drug treatment.
